snippet.title: Classic Game Room - BENTLEY COMPU-VISION review
snippet.description:
Bentley Compu-Vision game system review!

Classic Game Room reviews the BENTLEY COMPU-VISION battery powered game console from 1983! Released in 1983 the Bentley Compu-Vision would have been outdated when it was brand new, but for some reason it's extremely likable! The Bentley has four versions of Pong including Tennis, Soccer, Squash and Solo Handball! It runs on 4 AA batteries and features a furniture grade wood finish (sort of)!
